ğŸ“– Summary: AndroidMic allows you to use your Android phone as a wireless or USB microphone for your PC. It supports multiple platforms and includes features like noise cancellation and audio visualization.

ğŸ’¡ js-draw | TypeScript
ğŸ¯ Primary Use Case: To provide a robust and flexible JavaScript library for building freehand drawing applications with advanced features like infinite zoom and touch support.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Very large zoom range (10â»Â¹â°x to 10Â¹â°x) â€¢ Touchscreen and stylus support with gesture recognition â€¢ User-configurable tools (pen style, color, etc.) â€¢ Partial stroke erasing â€¢ Collaborative editing
ğŸ“– Summary: js-draw is a freehand drawing library for JavaScript and TypeScript, enabling users to create and manipulate drawings with a wide zoom range, touch support, and customizable tools. It outputs drawings in SVG format and supports collaborative editing.

ğŸ”¥ youtube-smart-speed | JavaScript
ğŸ¯ Primary Use Case: To enhance the YouTube viewing experience by optimizing playback speed to reduce wasted time during silences and improve comprehension during speech.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Intelligent speed control using AI audio analysis â€¢ Adaptive acceleration during silence â€¢ Controlled deceleration during speech â€¢ Machine learning for usage pattern adaptation â€¢ Manual speed control option
ğŸ“– Summary: YouTube Smart Speed is a Firefox extension that uses AI to intelligently adjust YouTube video playback speed. It automatically speeds up during silences and slows down during speech, with fully customizable settings and machine learning capabilities.
ğŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ğŸ”“ Open Source

ğŸ’¡ QualityScaler | Python
ğŸ¯ Primary Use Case: Enhancing and upscaling the quality of images and videos using AI on a Windows PC.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ AI-powered image and video upscaling â€¢ Noise reduction and enhancement â€¢ Support for multiple GPUs (NVIDIA, AMD, Intel) â€¢ DirectX 12 acceleration â€¢ User-friendly GUI
ğŸ“– Summary: QualityScaler is a Windows application that uses AI to enhance, upscale, and de-noise images and videos. It leverages deep learning models and supports various hardware accelerators for efficient processing directly on the user's PC.
ğŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ğŸ”“ Open Source

ğŸ”¥ youtube-ai-extension | TypeScript
ğŸ¯ Primary Use Case: Enhancing the YouTube viewing experience by allowing users to interact with video content through an AI-powered chat interface.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Real-time chat with YouTube videos â€¢ Video summarization â€¢ Question and Answer functionality â€¢ Context-aware responses â€¢ User-friendly interface integrated into YouTube
ğŸ“– Summary: This repository provides an interactive Chrome extension for YouTube that leverages the OpenAI API to enable real-time chat with video content. Users can get summaries, ask questions, and receive context-aware responses directly within the YouTube interface.
